channel.title: I need some help
channel.description:
I need a lot of help with my server so I will ask all my questions here.
Ok, first question. My ::pnpc doesn't work. I have tried on a few different servers and none of them worked.
Second question. Is there any way that I could give someone when they first join my server to go to two places? Like...
Click a location to go there Varrock Camelot
I also want to know if there is a way that I could put two servers together. Like if I have Satan's Isle and fr33sc4p3 pkz, I would want to put those two together. Like the npcs, portals, everything like that.
And last question. I need to know how to change what the admin/mod crowns look like. Maybe from gold to blue or something like that. I've seen it done on a server. I've looked everywhere and couldn't find answers to any of these.
Help would be appreciated.
Seth

item.title: I need some help
item.dc:creator: @mrdek11 mrdek11
item.description:
@mrdek11 wrote:

For the pnpc, you might need to be admin, are you an admin on these servers you’ve tried it on?

Also you could use a dialogue to send an option for varrock or camelot.

To change sprites (mod icons in this case) you need a client with a modified cache.

Read full topic
